item.title: 竞争对手苦苦挣扎，特拉菲古拉石油公司总裁称资产支撑利润
item.description: 创辉集团石油业务主管本-勒考克（Ben Luckock）表示，创辉集团最近对炼油厂和分销资产的投资有助于支持其石油业务，即使在竞争对手盈利能力下滑的情况下也是如此。【原文：Trafigura Group’s recent investments in refineries and distribution assets have helped support its oil business, even as rivals saw their profitability slide, according to the trader’s head of oil, Ben Luckock.】

item.title: 新加坡将于今年公布股东 "价值释放 "计划
item.description: 新加坡计划在今年晚些时候公布 "价值释放 "一揽子计划的细节，政府将采取进一步行动，提高人们对其股市的兴趣。【原文：Singapore plans to unveil details of a “value unlock” package later this year, as the government takes further action to boost interest in its stock market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚最大天然气出口厂获得最终批准，将运行至 2070 年
item.description: 澳大利亚第一家也是最大的液化天然气工厂通过了运营至 2070 年的最后一关，在这之前，运营商伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）历经近七年的努力，但却遭到了环保人士和担心工厂污染的传统业主的反对。【原文：Australia’s first and largest liquefied natural gas plant cleared the final hurdle to operate until 2070, after an almost seven-year process during which operator Woodside Energy Group Ltd. faced opposition from environmentalists and traditional owners concerned about the site’s pollution.】

item.title: 市场跌势加剧，中国债券流动数据暂停发布
item.description: 据中国一家著名的金融数据提供商的一些客户称，该公司已停止发布追踪地方债券流动的数据，因为中国股市的上涨助长了主权债务的抛售。【原文：A popular Chinese financial data provider has halted releasing figures tracking local bond flows, according to some of the firm’s clients, as a rally in the country’s stock market fuels a selloff in sovereign debt.】

item.title: 自由港称格拉斯贝格铜矿仍因救援工作而停产
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport McMoRan Inc.【原文：Freeport McMoRan Inc. said operations at its giant Indonesian copper mine remain suspended as the company continued efforts to rescue seven workers trapped underground earlier this week.】

item.title: 帕萨利德斯称欧洲央行无需更多削减即可实现 2% 的通胀率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员克里斯托多洛斯-帕萨利德斯（Christodoulos Patsalides）表示，目前欧洲中央银行没有必要进一步降低利率，以实现稳定的通货膨胀。【原文：There’s currently no need for the European Central Bank to lower interest rates further to deliver stable inflation, according to Governing Council member Christodoulos Patsalides.】

item.title: 欧盟监管机构寻求解决英国担保债务的等效性难题
item.description: 欧盟银行业规则制定者正准备详细说明等效制度的条款，允许欧洲银行在其紧急流动性缓冲中使用英国担保债券，条件与国内债务相同。【原文：The EU’s banking rule-setter is preparing to detail terms for an equivalence regime allowing European banks to use UK covered bonds in their emergency liquidity buffers under the same terms as domestic debt.】

item.title: 随着全球船队老化，托克集团计划再订购两艘超级油轮
item.description: Trafigura 集团正计划从一家中国船厂再订购两艘超级油轮，这家贸易巨头希望通过建立自己的船队来降低其在不可预测的航运市场中的风险。【原文：Trafigura Group is planning to order two more supertankers from a Chinese yard, as the trading giant looks to reduce its exposure to an unpredictable shipping market by building its own fleet.】

item.title: 中国力争到 2027 年将储能能力提高一倍以上
item.description: 中国计划在未来两年内将储能能力提高一倍以上，以进一步加快可再生能源的部署。【原文：China plans to more than double its energy storage capacity in the next two years to further accelerate the deployment of renewables.】

item.title: Citymapper 应用程序所有者 Via 和控股公司在首次公开募股中筹资 4.929 亿美元
item.description: 公共交通软件制造商 Via Transportation 公司及其部分股东在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 4.929 亿美元，发行价高于市场定价范围。【原文：Public transportation software maker Via Transportation Inc. and some of its shareholders raised $492.9 million in a US initial public offering priced above a marketed range.】

item.title: 特朗普特使人选称美印在贸易协议上 "差距不大
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的大使人选周四表示，美国和印度即将解决在贸易协议上的分歧，同时重申了新德里停止购买俄罗斯石油的要求。【原文：The US and India are close to resolving differences over a trade deal, President Donald Trump’s pick for ambassador said Thursday, while reiterating demands that New Delhi stop buying Russian oil.】

item.title: 美国对冲基金公司 Capstone 关闭香港办事处
item.description: 随着越来越多的跨国对冲基金在亚洲开展业务，对较小人才库的压力也随之增大，总部位于纽约、市值 110 亿美元的 Capstone Investment Advisors LLC 将在四年后关闭其香港办事处。【原文：Capstone Investment Advisors LLC, the $11 billion New York-based firm, is shutting its Hong Kong office after about four years, as a growing list of multistrategy hedge funds operating in Asia intensify pressure for the smaller talent pool.】

item.title: 美团推出人工智能代理，促进餐饮外卖业务发展
item.description: 美团推出了一款新的人工智能代理应用程序，旨在促进其餐饮外卖和本地服务业务的发展，因为美团与阿里巴巴集团争夺中国消费者的战斗已经进入白热化阶段。【原文：Meituan has launched a new AI agent app that aims to boost its food delivery and local services business, as its battle with Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. for Chinese consumers heats up.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行警告地缘政治动荡显示 "和平红利已经结束
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行（Reserve Bank）的一位高级官员周五表示，世界正在从冷战后的稳定和一体化时期转变为地缘政治风险和战略竞争日益加剧的时期，迫使各国政府和企业建立代价高昂的保障措施。【原文：The world is shifting from a period of post-Cold War stability and integration to one where rising geopolitical risks and strategic rivalry are forcing governments and companies to build costly safeguards, a senior official at the Reserve Bank of Australia said Friday.】

item.title: 澳元将因利率背离和中国刺激政策而进一步攀升
item.description: 由于与美国的利差缩小以及中国的刺激政策，澳元可能会在年底延续涨势。【原文：Australia’s dollar may extend its rally into the end of the year on narrowing interest-rate differentials with the US and Chinese stimulus.】

item.title: 花旗集团聘请银行业资深人士李珊担任亚洲区重要职务
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）任命李珊（Shan Li）为日本、北亚和澳大利亚地区主席，常驻香港，这是该银行近期招聘的新成员。【原文：Citigroup Inc. has named Shan Li chairman of Japan, Asia North and Australia, based in Hong Kong, adding to recent hires made by the bank.】

item.title: 高盛看涨中国石油库存至 2026 年的前景
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Group Sachs Inc.【原文：China is expected to keep stockpiling crude at an accelerated rate this year and throughout 2026, as lower prices and the focus on energy security drive a buying spree, according to Goldman Group Sachs Inc.】

item.title: 中国就关税问题向墨西哥发出严厉警告似乎在讨好美国
item.description: 中国敦促墨西哥在征收关税前 "三思而后行"，这一警告可能预示着中国政府愿意对墨西哥的这一举动进行报复，因为墨西哥认为中国政府屈从了美国的要求。【原文：China urged Mexico to “think twice” before levying tariffs, a warning that could signal Beijing’s willingness to retaliate over a move it sees as giving into demands from the US.】

item.title: ReNew 正与全球银行洽谈 8.15 亿美元贷款事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的可再生能源公司之一 ReNew Energy Global Plc 正在与一组全球贷款人谈判，以筹集约 8.15 亿美元的贷款用于再融资。【原文：ReNew Energy Global Plc, one of India’s largest renewable energy companies, is in talks with a group of global lenders to raise a loan of about $815 million for refinancing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 经济降温，俄罗斯央行将继续下调关键利率
item.description: 随着经济降温速度超过预期，俄罗斯央行准备继续大幅降息，今年的经济增长有可能低于官方目标。【原文：The Bank of Russia is poised to continue steep rate cuts as the economy cools faster than expected, with growth at risk of undershooting official targets this year.】

item.title: 印度黄金 ETF 因避险吸引力继续大放异彩
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局批准 Apple Watch 下周推出高血压检测功能
item.description: 苹果公司表示，其智能手表高血压检测系统已于周四获得美国食品和药物管理局的许可，将于下周上市。【原文：Apple Inc. said its hypertension detection system for its smart watch will arrive next week after receiving clearance Thursday from the US Food and Drug Administration.】

item.title: 铁矿石每周小幅上涨，主要钢铁活动增加
item.description: 由于数据显示中国阅兵后钢厂活动迅速恢复，且一个主要出口中心的供应放缓，铁矿石迎来了第三个周度涨幅。【原文：Iron ore headed for its third weekly gain as data showed steel mill activity resumed rapidly after China’s military parade and supplies from a major export hub slowed.】

item.title: 潜在竞购后恒大物业股价上涨 40
item.description: 周五上午，恒大物业服务集团有限公司（Evergrande Property Services Group Ltd.）股价跳涨40%，创八个月来最大涨幅，原因是有消息称竞购者对该公司表示出兴趣。【原文：Shares of Evergrande Property Services Group Ltd. jumped as much as 40% Friday morning, the biggest jump in eight months, amid news that bidders had indicated interest in the company.】

item.title: 越南称国家信用中心遭黑客攻击，警告数据被盗
item.description: 越南政府网站发布消息称，越南已确认国家信用信息中心遭受网络攻击，可能导致个人数据重大泄露，并警告公众提高警惕。【原文：Vietnam has confirmed that a cyberattack on the National Credit Information Center could have led to a major breach of personal data and has warned the public to be on alert, according to a post on the government website.】

item.title: 日本顶级租赁商 Orix 计划将房地产基金规模扩大 33
item.description: 欧力士公司（Orix Corp. ）的房地产投资部门将其一只基金的目标规模提高了 33%，反映了日本机构投资者对房地产市场交易需求的反弹。【原文：Orix Corp.’s real estate investment unit has raised the target size of one of its funds by 33%, reflecting rebounding Japanese institutional investor demand for property market deals.】

item.title: 印尼查封部分青山巨型矿山后，镍涨势喜人
item.description: 印尼查封了中国最大生产商青山控股集团有限公司拥有的一个巨型矿山的部分矿区后，镍上涨，凸显了世界最大矿石供应国矿石产量面临的风险。【原文：Nickel rose after Indonesia seized part of a giant mine part-owned by top Chinese producer Tsingshan Holding Group Co., underlining risks to ore output in the world’s largest supplier.】

item.title: 中国经济疲软之夏可能延续至八月
item.description: 中国经济在 8 月份可能又经历了一个月的疲软，工业产出和投资的放缓抵消了零售销售的小幅改善。【原文：China’s economy likely endured another month of weakness in August, with a slowdown in industrial output and investment offsetting a slight improvement in retail sales.】

item.title: 据称紫金黄金将于下周评估 30 亿美元首次公开募股的兴趣
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，紫金黄金国际股份有限公司计划最快于下周开始评估投资者对在香港首次公开募股的兴趣，募集资金可能超过 30 亿美元。【原文：Zijin Gold International Co. is planning to begin gauging investor interest as soon as next week for a Hong Kong initial public offering that may fetch more than $3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新西兰消费者支出下降暗示经济萎缩
item.description: 在截至 6 月份的三个月里，新西兰消费者缩减了支出，从而加强了人们对新西兰经济在此期间出现倒退的预期。【原文：New Zealand consumers scaled back spending in the three months through June, reinforcing expectations the economy took a step backwards in the period.】
